name: node-nomad-sdk
description: A NodeJS SDK for interacting with a Nomad cluster
author: Cameron Legleiter <camlegleiter@gmail.com>

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require babel-register --require test/.setup.js --recursive
scripts.transpile: rm -rf dist/* && babel src --out-dir dist/src && babel test --out-dir dist/test && cp package.json dist/
